question_15.description: Would you be interested in receiving information about issues that affect smokers?

question_17.description: Do you have any family members or friends who are smokers and 21 years of age or older? Please print their full names, addresses, birth dates, telephone numbers, and regular brands below:

survey_submission.instructions: Please send survey along with 40 pack proofs of purchase, LPCi symbols, and $3.95 postage and handling to:
survey_submission.additional_info: All umbrella offers and surveys must be received by 10/6Aq. Offer limited to smokers 21 years of age or older. Please allow 10 to 12 weeks for delivery. Not responsible for lost, misplaced, directed, mutilated, or postage-due submissions. Limit one umbrella per person regardless of the number of surveys completed.
